description:
cmd/cov: delete
It doesn't work, it's not portable, it's not part of the released
binaries, and a better tool is due.

Fixes issue 1319.
Fixes issue 4621.

messages.text:
On 2013/05/23 23:44:11, r wrote:
> Added references to 1319 and 4621.

Fire when ready.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

LGTM



On Thu, May 23, 2013 at 4:27 PM, <r@golang.org> wrote:

> Reviewers: golang-dev1,
>
> Message:
> Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,
>

> https://code.google.com/p/go/
>
>
> Description:
> cmd/cov: delete
> It doesn't work, it's not part of the released binaries, and a better
> tool is due.
>
> Please review this at https://codereview.appspot.**com/9681044/<https://codereview.appspot.com/9681044/>
>
> Affected files:
>   R src/cmd/cov/Makefile
>   R src/cmd/cov/doc.go
>   R src/cmd/cov/main.c
>   R src/cmd/cov/tree.c
>   R src/cmd/cov/tree.h
>   M src/cmd/dist/build.c
>   M src/sudo.bash
>

> .
>
>
>

LGTM. Possibly make reference to
https://code.google.com/p/go/issues/detail?id=4621

cmd/cov: delete
It doesn't work, it's not portable, it's not part of the released
binaries, and a better tool is due.

Fixes issue 1319.
Fixes issue 4621.

CC=golang-dev
